uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.userinterface

Class CandyManipulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.userinterface.CandyManipulator

  • public class CandyManipulator
extends java.lang.Object
    handles some more line intensive functions manipulating the transformations to candy positions. This includes the operations of moving offsets and resizing them, (for a single timestep)
